directions: In a bowl mix together 5 tbsp butter, 1 tsp baking powder and ½ cup cream cheese. Then add in flour and a little salt. Mix well and knead to dough.
Spread the dough in a quiche tray, keep aside.

In a bowl mix together 1 chopped red capsicum, ¼ bunch of chopped parsley, 2 eggs, 125 ml milk, 100 gm ground almonds, 1 tsp oregano, ½ tsp crushed red pepper and 100 gm grated cheddar cheese. Mix well.
Spread on top of quiche base and bake in a preheated oven on 180 degrees for 20 – 25 minutes.
Now remove from oven, cut into wedges and serve.
title: Herb & Cheese Quiche
